attributes.action: Reinstate the Dubs Amendment to house refugee children immediately.
attributes.background: Abandoning the commitment at 400 out of the 3000 the UK promised to accommodate is a national disgrace. It brings shame on our country. It leaves children, in need of urgent, life critical, assistance, in danger.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
